label: I keep shared promises even when inconvenient.

I speak up if something repeatedly bothers me.

I’d rather talk issues out than let them fade.

I’m comfortable setting personal boundaries with friends at home.
I’m curious about others’ routines/traditions and can adapt at home.

I can tolerate some mess without it bothering me.
I’m okay borrowing/lending small items with explicit permission.

I prefer no showers after quiet hours begin.

label: Laundry hours stance.
If someone repeatedly misses their chores, there should be agreed-upon consequences.

Prefer dishwasher loading rules posted.

Common areas for socializing, bedrooms for privacy.

Borrowing policy.
